channel.title: Ice40 on Project F
channel.description: Recent content in Ice40 on Project F

item.title: SPRAM on iCE40 FPGA
item.description: The iCE40 UltraPlus distinguishes itself from the rest of the iCE40 FPGA family by including a relatively generous 1 Mb (128 KiB) of single port synchronous SRAM known as SPRAM. SPRAM blocks are much larger than BRAM but are limited to a single port and 16-bit data bus.
